top.title: Zelensky plans to meet Trump on Sunday for talks on ending Russian war
top.summary: The Ukrainian leader says he will see the US president in Florida and believes "a lot can be decided before the new year".

top.title: US launches strikes against Islamic State in Nigeria
top.summary: President Trump has previously accused the Nigerian government of failing to protect Christians from jihadists.

top.title: Blast at Syrian mosque during Friday prayers leaves at least eight dead
top.summary: The explosion in Homs targeted a predominantly Alawite area, a sect that has faced crackdowns and violence since the fall of former-President Bashar al-Assad.

top.title: UK social media campaigners among five denied US visas
top.summary: The Trump administration bans five people who have called for tech regulation from entering the country.

top.title: TikTok removes AI weight loss ads from fake Boots account
top.summary: The adverts for prescription-only drugs showed healthcare professionals impersonating the British retailer.

top.title: Call of Duty co-creator Vince Zampella dies in California car crash
top.summary: The influential video game developer died after his car crashed and caught fire on a highway in Los Angeles.

title.#text: Framework announces another memory price hike — and it likely won’t be its last
Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition and other Switch games are up to 50 percent off
Google is letting some people change their @gmail address
